moduleDescription: General subjects and standard practices for AME M1/M2 (math, physics, electricity, hardware, drawings and basic structures).

sets.name: 01 – Math & Physics
sets.subtitle: Basic mathematics and physics for aviation maintenance.

sets.name: 02 – Electricity & Electronics
sets.subtitle: Basic electricity, electronic principles and circuit fundamentals.

sets.name: 03 – Hardware & Materials
sets.subtitle: Fasteners, materials, hardware identification and usage.

sets.name: 04 – Drawings & Diagrams
sets.subtitle: Blueprint reading, symbols, schematics and wiring diagrams.

sets.name: 05 – Weight & Balance
sets.subtitle: Weight and balance concepts, calculations and documentation.

sets.name: 06 – Metal & Corrosion
sets.subtitle: Metallurgy basics, corrosion types, detection and prevention.

sets.name: 08 – Servicing & Standard Practices
sets.subtitle: Servicing, ground handling and general maintenance practices.

sets.name: 09 – Tools & Measuring Devices
sets.subtitle: Hand tools, special tools and precision measuring devices.

sets.name: 10 – Basic Structures
sets.subtitle: Basic airframe structural concepts and inspection points.
